_sText:
<object width="425" height="350"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/FwjmRD459WQ"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/FwjmRD459WQ" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" width="425" height="350"></embed></object>


Well, its taken me 8 version to get this map maxxed out with enjoyability and fun and this is the very best and very last version of this map.

Final Features include - 

1) DJ Room with new songs (differnet songs from v7)
2) Springy diving boards
3) Breakable Igloos (yes no more camping in them like v7)
4) Breakable cages (yes no more invincibility mode like in v7 lol)
5) Very professional lighting
6) Electricity Traps
7) Great gameplay
8) Lots of swimming !!!! (well if you want to)
9) DISCO LIGHTS !!!! (lol)

This map isnt going to scare the pants off you like other maps, but its very pretty, the gameplay is very balanced, and theres plenty of hiding spots.

This should be the only version your server runs, so go ahead and please update.

People love this map :)

Please vote for this map if you like it, many people have said this is one of the best zombie maps theyve played.
